objects.text:
• 16.3MP X-Trans CMOS II Sensor
• Classic Design, Premium Build
• Advanced 77-Point AF System

product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Professional Mirrorless Camera - Classic Design Meets Modern Innovation
product_details.description:
• 16.3MP X-Trans CMOS II APS-C sensor for exceptional image quality
• Retro-inspired classic design with premium build quality
• Advanced autofocus system with 77 AF points
• High-resolution electronic viewfinder (2.36M-dot)
• Tiltable 3.0-inch LCD screen for flexible shooting angles
• Built-in Wi-Fi connectivity for easy photo sharing
• Film Simulation modes for creative photography
• Full HD 1080p video recording capability
• Compatible with Fujifilm X-mount lenses
• Compact and lightweight body ideal for travel photography
• Multiple manual control dials for precise settings adjustment
• Real-time shooting preview with advanced filters
• Up to 8 FPS continuous shooting speed
• Weather-sealed body construction

banner_details:
This banner presents a modern and professional promotional design for a mirrorless camera. The layout is cleanly split into two vertical halves: the left showcases key product text, while the right highlights the product image. The **heading** and **subheading** draw immediate attention with bold typography. A brief feature list appears under **description**, followed by a large, sleek **price** tag. A prominent red button labeled by the **cta** invites purchase action, while a muted **tagline** subtly reinforces the brand message. Background details like concentric-line circles, red triangular accents, and dividers add a tech-inspired visual rhythm.

**Color Palette**:
- Charcoal Black (#1A1A1A)
- Dark Gray (#222222)
- Bright Red (#E62F2B)
- White (#FFFFFF)
- Light Gray (#CCCCCC)
product_color: The product image showcases the Fujifilm X-T10 camera, dominated by deep matte black (#1A1A1A) that defines its structure and lends a professional, premium look. This black color blends with subtle metallic greys such as graphite (#2E2E2E) and charcoal (#3C3C3C), enhancing texture and depth. White accents (#FFFFFF) like the brand name and control labels provide sharp contrast and instantly draw the eye. Small elements of red (#FF3B3B) and orange (#FF9C2E) around the lens ring add visual pop and guide user attention to key functional areas. A banner could benefit from this palette by emphasizing contrast and sophistication, appealing to photography enthusiasts.
